General.Name: Putra Rajawali Kencana PT
General.Description: PT Putra Rajawali Kencana Tbk engages in the transportation sector in Indonesia and internationally. The company offers transportation, warehousing, leasing, and wholesale or retail trading services. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Rungkut Industri Raya No 1F, Surabaya, Indonesia, 60292
